attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Current cost of collecting income tax: 
£2.2bn.
Current total number of people paying income tax:
29m.
Number of people working in all public departments (inc NHS, Police, Fire, MoD, Civil Service etc):
5.5m.
Average cost of collecting income tax per person:
£75.
1) Reduce income tax for all public workers to 0.
2) Reduce their pay to the same as they previously received after income tax.
Save all the money spent endlessly collecting then redistributing, improving efficiency.
*All figures are approximate and assume collection cost is directly proportional to number of payers.
